adrFormatAddress: 993 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028-0809, USA

originalText.text: Today I saw the new physical therapist Seonjoong, omg he is amazing, very professional, knowledgeable, at the top of his game!!  I came in feeling pain, he showed me the proper way to stretch, and did some work with me, which made me 100% better when I left that office!  At the office today I also  saw Ah Young, an awesome acupuncturist, guarantee you after seeing her, you will leave different than when you came in!  Dr. Johar is a true professional and staff is always on point always ready and willing to help, TARIK Office manager is extremely amazing, and the young lady working at the front desk Wendy, is extremely friendly, well organized, and knowledgeable and very efficient at scheduling and keeping you up-to-date on medication refills!  If you ever want to go to a place where things get done quickly and your pain is rectified ASAP go to Park Avenue Medicine at 993 Park Ave.!

originalText.text:
Staff was friendly and very competent.
I had seen Dr Erenberg years ago in a different practice, and think very very highly of him. he is excellent, and he spends a lot of time explaining things which is very appreciated.

originalText.text: Dr Johar is extremely thorough and knowledgable. He seems to take a more conservative, holistic approach- instead of just slapping a bandaid on the problem, he was ready to investigate the root cause- which is kind of rare these days. Additionally, he has excellent bedside manner and I felt like I was in good hands. 10/10 would recommend.

originalText.text: It's always a pleasure with Dr Johar mainly because I get the proper medical attention and care that I need. I would most definitely refer friends and family members that is seeking a doctor who specializes in pain management and rehabilitation.

originalText.text: Waiting period improved. Dr. Johar is a great doctor.  He shows his concerns for his patients.  A great experience allowing Dr. J. TREAT ME.
